rdfs:label: Not eXactly C
ns:common.topic.description: Not eXactly C, or NXC, is a high-level programming language for the Lego Mindstorms NXT. NXC, which is short for Not eXactly C, is based on Next Byte Codes, an assembly language. NXC has a syntax like C. The IDE for NXC is the Bricx Command Center.\nThe NXC compiler is available under the Mozilla Public License. A sample code is as shown below:
